metric.descr: Number of wave-cycles spent waiting for LDS instruction issue. In units of 4 cycles. (per-simd, nondeterministic)
Number of cycles the SQ instruction arbiter is working on a VALU instruction. (per-simd, nondeterministic)
Number of cycles needed to execute non-memory read scalar operations. (per-simd, emulated)
Number of thread-cycles used to execute VALU operations (similar to INST_CYCLES_VALU but multiplied by # of active threads). (per-simd)
Number of cycles LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. (emulated)

metric.name: TCC_MC_WRREQ
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte transactions going over the TC_MC_wrreq interface. Atomics may travel over the same interface and are generally classified as write requests.

metric.name: TCC_MC_WRREQ_STALL
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled.

metric.name: TCP_TA_DATA_STALL_CYCLES
metric.descr: TCP stalls TA data interface. Now Windowed.
Number of wave-cycles spent waiting for LDS instruction issue. In units of 4 cycles. (per-simd, nondeterministic)
regspec 71? Number of cycles the SQ instruction arbiter is working on a VALU instruction. (per-simd, nondeterministic)
Number of cycles needed to execute non-memory read scalar operations. (per-simd, emulated)
Number of thread-cycles used to execute VALU operations (similar to INST_CYCLES_VALU but multiplied by # of active threads). (per-simd)
Number of cycles LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. (emulated)

metric.name: TCP_TA_DATA_STALL_CYCLES
metric.descr: TCP stalls TA data interface. Now Windowed.
